title: Should I Be Upset with My Husband for What He Did on New Year's Eve?
description:
In this classic episode from 2018, Wendy's husband attempted to back out of their New Year's Eve plans, and when he didn't get his way, he acted miserable the whole evening. Does Wendy have a right to be upset with him, or should she try harder to see his side?

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
